channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Lego Smart Play hands-on: Using technology to get kids to play together
item.description: Lego’s new Smart Play system, announced at CES earlier this week, is an embrace of digital technology the likes of which we haven’t seen from the company before. And while the demonstration it gave on Monday was a good start towards showing just what Lego’s Smart Brick is capable of, there’s no substitute for seeing it in person. Fortunately, an extended demo answered a lot of my questions on how the system will work once kids and adults get their hands on the first round of sets with Smart Play.As I detailed yesterday, the Smart Play system contains three elements. The Smart Brick is packed w...

item.title: Maybe We Should Pump the Brakes on the Idea That Robotaxis Are Safer
item.description: The evidence is sparse.

item.title: Black Ops 7 Season One Reloaded brings some beautiful new maps to the game — here are its official release times
item.description: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Season One Reloaded is almost here, so here are the official release times and some of its biggest inclusions.

item.title: Honor ne savait pas qui copier entre Apple et Google, alors ils ont fait les deux et c’est pas mal
item.description: C'est un mélange bizarre entre un Google Pixel et un iPhone Air. Mais ne vous arrêtez pas au design. Le Honor Magic 8 Air affiche une fiche technique intéressante pour un format "Slim". Avec ses 158 grammes et sa puce haut de gamme, Honor semble avoir trouvé la formule magique que Apple cherche encore.

item.title: Votre MacBook devient enfin tactile : cet accessoire génial devance Apple de quasiment un an
item.description: Transformer son MacBook en écran tactile, c'est bientôt possible avec l'accessoire Magic Screen. Bientôt lancé sur Kickstarter, le produit débloque de nouvelles utilisations dignes d'un iPad sur l'écran de votre MacBook.

item.title: Les plus grosses nouveautés électriques du CES 2026 sont à découvrir dans notre émission Survoltés du jour : il va y en avoir pour tout le monde
item.description: L’équipe Survoltés (Frandroid) et Vroom (Numerama) vous donnent rendez-vous ce mercredi 7 janvier, dès 18h, pour une émission spéciale CES 2026. Au menu du jour : des nouveautés électriques très excitantes et un duplex en direct de Las Vegas.

item.title: Everything announced at CES 2026
item.description: It's the first week of a new year and there's no time for the tech world to slowly ease back into things following the holidays. That's because CES 2026 is in full swing, with all manner of companies descending on Las Vegas to reveal their latest innovations and what they're planning to bring your way in the near future. Many of the Engadget crew are on the ground to check out as much of the new tech as possible. Of course, we're keeping tabs on all of the major CES press conferences too. Samsung held its First Look presentation, which focuses on home products, while LG has shown off a wide ar...

item.title: The best tech announced at CES 2026 so far
item.description: The CES show floor officially opened its doors yesterday and along with it came a deluge of more announcements and reveals. If you're struggling to stay on top of all the new tech, gadgets, concepts, and AI-powered devices as day two gets underway, we've rounded up some of the best hardware and upgrades that have […]

item.title: Oubliez le Wi-Fi 7 : le Wi-Fi 8 s’invite par surprise au CES 2026
item.description: Le CES 2026 crée la surprise : alors que le Wi-Fi 7 s'installe à peine, le Wi-Fi 8 débarque déjà. Asus et MediaTek dévoilent les premiers routeurs, mais vous encore le temps avant de vous équiper.

item.title: La fin du double écran ? Ce PC portable Lenovo cache une fonctionnalité géniale
item.description: Lors du CES 2026 de Las Vegas, Lenovo a dévoilé le Legion Pro Rollable Concept, un PC portable dont l'écran peut s'étirer physiquement pour atteindre une diagonale de 24 pouces.

item.title: Your Ring doorbell and cameras are getting a huge upgrade with AI-powered warnings when something looks unusual
item.description: Ring launches new AI alerts, plus a collection of sensors to detect break-ins, floods, carbon monoxide, and much more.

item.title: Je n’ai aucun style, mais je porte des lunettes de natation connectées
item.description: J'ignorais totalement qu'il existait des lunettes de piscine connectées, puis j'ai découvert les Holoswim 2 Pro.

item.title: What is the release date for Spartacus: House of Ashur episode 7 on Starz?
item.description: With Opiter's shock death at the end of episode 6, all hell is about to break loose. But when does Spartacus: House of Ashur episode 7 drop on Starz?

item.title: Mia Goth Declares ‘The Odyssey’ Better Than ‘Star Wars,’ Sorta
item.description: The 'Pearl' and 'Frankenstein' star has slightly different levels of compliments for both upcoming films.

item.title: Don’t like Spotify Messages? These two big upgrades could soon change your mind
item.description: You can now see your friends' listening activity in real time, and send Jam requests with Spotify Messages.

item.title: Klipsch Atlas HP-1 hands-on: A return to hi-fi headphones at CES 2026
item.description: Klipsch hasn’t debuted new headphones in years, but that’s going to change in 2026. At CES, Klipsch announced the upcoming Atlas hi-fi series that includes wireless and both closed and semi-open back models. All three are expected to arrive this summer, but the company hasn’t announced pricing or many details on any of them just yet. However, I was able to listen to the Atlas HP-1, the wireless model with active noise cancelation (ANC). Without going into specifics, Klipsch says the HP-1 is designed for both daily wear and travel. This is thanks to the combination of light weight, comfort and ...

item.title: Vie numérique | Comment protéger son téléphone des douaniers américains
item.description: En mars dernier, lorsque la douane américaine a refoulé un scientifique français après avoir fouillé son téléphone, les autorités françaises ont crié au scandale : des commentaires critiquant les politiques de Donald Trump, lus dans son téléphone, avaient motivé cette décision, a dénoncé Paris. Des responsables américains ont nié cette interprétation, mais depuis, bien des voyageurs se demandent si ces fouilles sont légales....

item.title: Roblox, Call of Duty, and Fortnite head up last year's most played games — and yes, that's the same as 2024
item.description: The top five most-played games of 2025 absolutely will not shock you, with usual suspects GTA, Fortnite, and Roblox heading up the list.

item.title: The Magic: The Gathering Tarkir Dragonstorm Booster Box is below market value at Amazon
item.description: The Magic: The Gathering Tarkir Dragonstorm Play Booster Box is on sale for $98.68 at Amazon. That's below market value.

item.title: Lenovo IdeaPad Pro 5 : taillé pour les créatifs, cet ultrabook avec RTX 4050 est 1 000 € moins cher pendant les soldes d’hiver (et une carte cadeau est offerte)
item.description: Avec son écran OLED bien fluide et sa carte graphique RTX 4050, le Lenovo IdeaPad Pro 5 est un ultraportable qui peut tout à fait accompagner les créateurs de contenu et les joueurs occasionnels. Pendant les soldes, Darty fait en plus chuter son prix, qui passe de 1 799,99 euros à 779,99 euros.

item.title: YouTube Music users are furious about AI slop songs –and as a recording musician, I'm angry too
item.description: AI slop isn't made to be listened to: it's there to trick you – and as a recording musician, I'm angry it's dominating YouTube Music recommendations

item.title: Google annonce une transformation majeure pour Snapseed sur Android
item.description: L’application de retouche photo de Google, Snapseed, va profiter d’une modernisation sur Android plusieurs mois après l’arrivée de la version 3.0 sur iPhone.

item.title: The weirdest tech we’ve seen at CES 2026
item.description: There's never a shortage of exciting and innovative tech at CES. A superthin TV and tri-folding phone are cool and all, but sometimes the weirdest gadgets are the ones that make us go "huh." Luckily, there was plenty of wacky stuff on the show floor this year, and we've rounded up some of the most […]

item.title: Ce TV Panasonic doté d’une dalle OLED de 55 pouces passe sous les 1 000 euros chez Boulanger pour les soldes d’hiver
item.description: Entre sa dalle OLED de 55 pouces et son taux de rafraîchissement de 144 Hz, ce Panasonic 55Z90BE6 a été pensé pour convenir à tout le monde. Pour les soldes d'hiver, il perd 800 euros chez Boulanger et tombe à 999 euros.

item.title: The Lego Botanicals Orchid is one of our favorite sets, and its currently over $10 off at Amazon
item.description: As of Jan. 7, the Lego Botanicals Orchid is discounted at Amazon to $39.98, 20% off its list price of $49.99.

item.title: The Pokémon TCG: Mega Evolution Phantasmal Flames Elite Trainer Box is close to market value at Amazon
item.description: The Pokémon TCG: Mega Evolution Phantasmal Flames Elite Trainer Box is on sale for $88.30 at Amazon.

item.title: I love that Lenovo has finally chosen SteamOS for the Legion Go 2, but it's kidding itself with that price tag
item.description: Lenovo, thanks for supporting SteamOS with the Legion Go 2, but the price tag is too extreme, and I don't think most consumers will consider this.

item.title: I tried Lego Star Wars Smart Play sets at CES — and the tech fades into the background when play begins
item.description: Lego's Smart Play system is the biggest change to the Lego brick in years, and at CES I went hands-on with the new Star Wars sets arriving in March.

item.title: The excellent Razer Wolverine V3 Pro is back on sale — and one is at a lowest-ever price
item.description: Here's some more discounts for the Razer Wolverine V3 Pro — including a lowest-ever 20% off its white colorway.

item.title: Logitech caused its mice to freak out by not renewing a certificate
item.description: If you're among the macOS users experiencing some weird issues with your Logitech mouse, then good news: Logitech has now released a fix. This comes after multiple Reddit users reported yesterday that Logi Options Plus - the app required to manage and configure the controls on Logitech accessories - had stopped working, preventing them from […]

item.title: CES 2026 live updates: See the latest news, surprises, and strange tech from LG, Samsung, Lego, and new startups
item.description: CES 2026 is finally here, and Mashable reporters are on the ground looking for the best in show. Get live updates from the showroom floor and behind the scenes.

item.title: En ces soldes d’hiver, la JBL Boombox 4 équipée d’une autonomie de 34 heures pense à l’été et perd 100 € chez Boulanger
item.description: La JBL Boombox 4 peut compter sur son design imposant pour délivrer un son puissant, mais chez Boulanger, elle s'allège de 100 euros à l'occasion des soldes d'hiver.

item.title: Kentucky just launched Digital ID on iPhones — and it’s coming to Apple Wallet soon
item.description: Kentucky has launched an app to store your digital ID documents on your phone.

item.title: Emma Stone Is Indignant You Would Think She Dared to Play Miss Piggy in the New ‘Muppets’ Movie
item.description: The two-time Oscar winner had the exact right answer when asked about her new project with Jennifer Lawrence.

item.title: Home Pilates Equipment for Studio-Quality Workouts (2026)
item.description: Here’s everything that you should buy, skip, or splurge on for your at-home Pilates workout.

item.title: I played with the Lego Smart Brick
item.description: When The Lego Group announced that its biggest innovation since 1978 would be a tiny proprietary computer brick, the reactions were divided. I heard from people concerned this was the death of imagination from a company that's all about imagination - and from people who thought it sounded pretty cool! Personally, I walked in skeptical. […]

item.title: Roblox now requires an age check if you want to chat
item.description: Roblox is rolling out its previously announced requirement for all users to go through an age estimation process to be able to use the platform's chat features. The policy was announced in November 2025 and was rolled out to Australia, New Zealand, and the Netherlands in December, but now users will be prompted to complete […]

item.title: Roblox now requires all users globally to complete age checks to access chat
item.description: Once users complete an age check, they can access age-based chat, which means they can only communicate with others in a similar age group.

item.title: Intel spinout Articul8 raises more than half of $70M round at $500M valuation
item.description: Articul8's valuation for its current funding round marks a roughly fivefold increase since its Series A.

item.title: MTV Rewind is a developer's tribute to 24/7 music video channels
item.description: MTV shut down its remaining 24/7 music channels in several countries, including the UK and Australia, at the end of 2025. The main MTV network shifted its focus to reality shows long ago and it occasionally dips back into music with things like the Video Music Awards, but this shutdown felt like the end of an era. If you yearn for the days when MTV actually played music videos, though, you might be in luck. A developer who goes by the name of Flexasaurus Rex has paid tribute to the MTV of old with a web app that has several channels of non-stop streaming music. MTV Rewind has 11 channels at th...

item.title: Roblox rolls out mandatory age checks for all users
item.description: Roblox expands its platform-wide age verification plans with mandatory age checks for any user wanting to chat online.

item.title: Boîte de réception | Vieille imprimante, Revenu Canada et numéros d’assurance sociale
item.description: Chaque mercredi, notre journaliste répond à vos questions en lien avec le numérique et les nouvelles technologies. Cette semaine, on se branche à une vieille imprimante, on revisite l’accès au site de l’ARC et on démystifie le numéro d’assurance sociale.

item.title: This Ninja Crispi is down to a record-low price — now even cheaper than Black Friday
item.description: The Ninja Crispi has all the advantages of a Ninja air fryer while being far more portable — and it's on sale now for a record low price at Amazon.

item.title: The Soundcore Space Q45 headphones are on sale for under $100 at Amazon — save $50 right now
item.description: As of Jan. 7, the Soundcore by Anker Space Q45 headphones are on sale at Amazon for $99.99, 33% off their retail price of $149.99.

item.title: Ces 2 extensions Chrome espionnent vos conversations avec ChatGPT et votre historique
item.description: Deux extensions Chrome très populaires ont espionné en douce les conversations de plus de 900 000 utilisateurs avec ChatGPT, DeepSeek ou Claude. L'une des extensions était même mise en avant par Google sur son Chrome Web Store. Il s'agit d'une vaste opération d'espionnage visant à dérober des secrets d'entreprises.

item.title: Jimmy Kimmel recaps Trumps latest unhinged speech with 57-second montage
item.description: Jimmy Kimmel has recapped Trump's latest speech to Republicans with a montage of the lowlights.
